metadata.name: Para Special Shampoo for Lice Nits Aerosol

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Bioallethrin was used for lice and scabies infestation Other pyrethroids are now used in place of bioallethrin

contraindications.disease: Bioallethrin can produce hypersensitivity reactions in patients sensitive to ragweed or chrysanthemum L2609 Ingestion of bioallethrin can produce life threatening convulsions or coma Less serious toxic effects include sore throat nausea vomiting abdominal pain mouth ulceration increased secretions and or dysphagia Systemic effects include dizziness headache and fatigue are common and palpitations chest tightness and blurred vision and occur 4 48 h after exposure Bioallethrin is not carcinogenic or mutagenic L991 In rats doses over 58 7 mg kg day produce reproductive effects and doses over 125 mg kg day are embryotoxic Observed LD50 for various routes in animal studies L991 Rat Male Oral 709 mg kg Female Oral 1040 mg kg Inhalation 2 51 mg L Rabbit Dermal 3000 mg kg
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Bioallethrin causes respiratory paralysis in lice and scabies parasites resulting in death A4852

The risk or severity of hypertension can be decreased when Bioallethrin is combined with Phenylephrine
The serum concentration of Bioallethrin can be decreased when it is combined with Cenobamate
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Amiodarone is combined with Bioallethrin
Bioallethrin may increase the immunosuppressive activities of Tacrolimus
Bioallethrin may increase the immunosuppressive activities of Sirolimus
The serum concentration of Bioallethrin can be increased when it is combined with Darunavir
Magnesium can cause a decrease in the absorption of Bioallethrin resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
The serum concentration of Bioallethrin can be increased when it is combined with Ritonavir
The serum concentration of Haloperidol can be increased when it is combined with Bioallethrin
The metabolism of Tucatinib can be decreased when combined with Bioallethrin
The serum concentration of Bioallethrin can be increased when it is combined with Selpercatinib
The serum concentration of the active metabolites of Octreotide can be increased when Octreotide is used in combination with Bioallethrin
The serum concentration of Bioallethrin can be increased when it is combined with Abametapir
The serum concentration of Bioallethrin can be decreased when it is combined with Satralizumab
